mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(name, pwd, IDCard, sex, birthday, tel, count, create_time, balance) VALUES(#{name}, #{pwd}, #{IDCard}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{tel}, #{count}, #{create_time}, #{balance})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE IDCard=#{IDCard} AND tel=#{tel}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pwd=#{pwd}, tel=#{tel} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
UPDATE user SET balance=balance+#{balance} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
